name: Space Lander (theElementalF0rce)
description:
This is my first completed game! It was built mainly from a tutorial in the zine here:https://eugene.libguides.com/gamedesign/pico8, so I can't take too much credit for the game, hence why it's free.

Also, completed perfectly in time for the Perseverance landing on Mars! Woot woot, go check it out on nasa.gov!
